2:T51e,{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"FAQPage","mainEntity":[{"@type":"Question","name":"Can I return to Argentina if I have dual citizenship?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"Yes! Argentina allows and recognizes dual citizenship. You can return anytime using your Argentine passport or DNI, with full citizen rights."}},{"@type":"Question","name":"Can my children born abroad get Argentine citizenship?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"Yes. Children born abroad to at least one Argentine parent are entitled to Argentine citizenship by descent. Register them at the nearest consulate."}},{"@type":"Question","name":"Do I need to do military service?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"No. Military service has been voluntary since 1994. There are no obligations for returning citizens."}},{"@type":"Question","name":"Is voting mandatory?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"Yes, for Argentine citizens aged 18-70 residing in Argentina. Voting is mandatory in all elections. Failure to vote can result in fines."}},{"@type":"Question","name":"What documents do I need to return?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"Valid Argentine passport or DNI. If your documents expired abroad, consulates can issue emergency travel documents. Renew DNI upon arrival."}}]}0:{"buildId":"XJ7f5RvYDcX4yjbAXmNYG","rsc":["$","$1","c",{"children":[[["$","script",null,{"type":"application/ld+json","dangerouslySetInnerHTML":{"__html":"$2"}}],["$","script",null,{"type":"application/ld+json","dangerouslySetInnerHTML":{"__html":"{\"@context\":\"https://schema.org\",\"@type\":\"BreadcrumbList\",\"itemListElement\":[{\"@type\":\"ListItem\",\"position\":1,\"name\":\"Home\",\"item\":\"https://expatsargentina.com\"},{\"@type\":\"ListItem\",\"position\":2,\"name\":\"Nationalities\",\"item\":\"https://expatsargentina.com/nationality\"},{\"@type\":\"ListItem\",\"position\":3,\"name\":\"Argentina\"}]}"}}],["$","div",null,{"className":"min-h-screen","children":[["$","section",null,{"className":"bg-gradient-to-b
